dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for affective behavior analysis in-the-wild, containing annotations for valence-arousal regression, basic emotions, and action units. It includes 567 videos annotated by valence-arousal, 548 videos annotated by 8 expression categories, and 547 videos annotated by 12 action units.
dcterms:title: Aff-Wild2

dcterms:creator: Dimitrios Kollias
dcterms:description: A dataset for the Affective Behavior Analysis in-the-wild (ABAW3) challenge, focusing on valence-arousal estimation, expression recognition, action unit detection, and multi-task learning.
dcterms:title: ABAW3 2022
